title: State v. Gary Mitchum Reeves – Episode 7 – Squeaky and the Hitman
description:
August 28, 2017 / Whether it was a murder or an arson that you needed done, Bo Salmon available for hire. But not all of the crimes he’s accused of committing were strictly for business.

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Thank you to our sponsors! 
 
Save an additional 15% off your first order at www.framebridge.com/undisclosed. 
 
Stamps.com has a special offer including 4-week trial  + postage + digital scale by going to www.stamps.com. Click on the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in Undisclosed!

Get your first three meals free by going to www.blueapron.com/undisclosed today!

#undisclosed #garymitchumreeves
